GEANT4 simulations + quick and dirty analysis code.

### Prerequisites
<!---->
This project uses [Nix](https://nixos.org/) to manage GEANT4 dependencies. Install it by following the instructions [here](https://nixos.org/download/).
Ensure [flakes are enabled](https://nixos.wiki/wiki/Flakes#Enable_flakes_permanently) in your Nix configuration.

The flakes here were generated with [this flake](https://github.com/ewtodd/geant4-env).
